pullrequest.title: Added battery element (contribution from Olivier Crave)

content.raw: In the original submission, just one battery element could be attached to a single link, and to have multiple batteries one would have had to create a link for each battery. Now that the concept of battery is more abstract, I don't see why it should not be attached to a model instead.
content.html: In the original submission, just one battery element could be attached to a single link, and to have multiple batteries one would have had to create a link for each battery. Now that the concept of battery is more abstract, I don't see why it should not be attached to a model instead.
